TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The Cloning Department is now mad at you for a huge demand of clone Jebs.

I wish for a HOUSE PARTY PROTOCOL.

Granted. The House Part Protocol is actually a code word for "Accidentally"-ing the Internet.

I wish i would stop forgeting things

Edited May 16, 2013 by Rage097
forgot to wish

Granted, you remember everything that you ever saw or heard and your brain cant handle it all and it explodes.

I wish that my eyes don't hurt when I'm tired.

Granted, but now they hurt when you not tired.

I wish that I could figure out how to properly use jet engines on reusable launchers.

Granted, but Scott Manley has now bought the rights for any and all KSP reusable rocket designs that use jet engines, so you are sued for all of your moneys.

I wish that U2 had their own U-2.

Granted, but while they are all on board, the Russians shoot it down

I wish for a kitten

Granted, but it breaks. (I've no idea what a U2 and U-2 actually are, so yeah.)

I wish the next person to post was a duck.

Granted, but now the poster above me is a goose.

I wish that Obama's life was made into a sitcom.

(also, you could have just copied U2 and U-2 into google to find out what they were How else do you think that I knew how to properly grant the really obscure wishes that chobit usually makes? )

Granted, but now he's president for life because of the huge success the sitcom had on TV.

I wish that i owned a bank

Granted. No one trusts you with their money.

I wish for superpowers without any detrimental side effects.

Granted, you are dissected by the government to find out why you have superpowers.

I wish to sleep.

Granted. You fall into a coma.

I wish they'd let us have larger avatars here. A few more pixels or so should do.

Granted, people have massive avatars that means it takes 10 minutes to load a page.

I wish for a avatar.

Granted, but you'll have to send a message to me about what you want before anything is going to happen.

I wish I had some tacos.

Granted, you get a million tacos which crush you with their weight.

I wish I knew what I wanted for an avatar.

granted but your brain exploads with all the ideas

i wish i was bigger

Granted, but now everyone else gets even bigger than you.

I wish that I had a can of thermite.

Edited May 17, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, it comes with Jeb.

I wish I could own a Skylon spaceplane with the necessary fuel and runway for multiple flights.

granted but it is shot down by syria.

i wish could go to space

Granted, you go to space strapped to the nose of the next supply mission to the ISS.

I wish that Syria won't shoot down my Skylon.

granted it misses and destroyes the ISS

i wish FOR BACON

Granted, pigs surround you and maul you to death for eating their relative.

I wish that my Skylon had a effective autopilot to prevent it from hitting the ISS or a manual for it.

granted but the manual is far too big and weighs to much making the skylon crash

i wish for a laptop

Granted, it is the first laptop made.

I wish the manual could be found online.

granted but you run out of download space on you hard drive when downloading it and your computer explodes due to overload of information destroying the skylon

i wish for the power to levitate things.
